msg: Merged the client session into NakedObjects

author: rcm
msg: Added a guard, during shutdown(), for the objects to be refreshed collection, as this is not necessarily set up.

author: rcm
msg: Refactored NakedObjects to allow - via subclasses - entries by threads to be accessed for server based implementations.  The default is now set up via NakedObjectsClient.
